title: Galactic Designs.
content: Galactic Designs is a website dedicated to providing users with stunning abstract wallpapers featuring swirling galaxies, bright colors, and intricate patterns. Our collection of wallpapers is carefully curated to ensure that each one is unique and visually appealing. Whether you're looking for a new desktop background or a wallpaper for your phone, Galactic Designs has something for everyone. With our easy-to-use interface, you can quickly browse through our collection and find the perfect wallpaper to suit your style. Upgrade your device's look today with Galactic Designs' mesmerizing wallpapers! ðŸš€ðŸŒŸ

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a swirling galaxy, with bright colors and intricate patterns."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
